question: 信じる
sourceMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>believe</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to believe</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>信</ja> is <ja>しん</ja> no matter what! See, if you believe, good things will happen. You should be able to read this.
